QuestData.Title: A Missing Master
QuestData.Description:
Master Ashton had me grab some healing supplies and run to Mayor Royston when those things attacked town. He didn't make it behind the barricade.
But if he's alive--and he's just crazy enough he might be--he's probably holed up in his cottage. With caustic compounds. And explosives.
Look, why don't you go check out his basement and I'll stay out of the blast radi- I mean I'll go see if the garden can be salvaged.
Try not to look flammable.
QuestData.CompletionText: Oh! You're not one of those monsters at all. Did you trounce those brutes?
QuestData.RewardText: I appreciate your help in liberating the town! I was becoming quite concerned by these strange monsters.
